body:
Sinse `ceres-solver` don't use `http://ceres-solver.org/ceres-solver-xxx.tar.gz` any more, it recommends user to use googlesource or github get the source code.

I found that googlesource source url is like that:
```
https://ceres-solver.googlesource.com/ceres-solver/+archive/399cda773035d99eaf1f4a129a666b3c4df9d1b1.tar.gz
```
Which means we cannot use version name in the url.

So, I think github maybe a better choice for the package.
title: ceres-solver: add v2.0.0
